Instance.description: An interaction that runs only one of its composing interactions based on priority and tests. If there are multiple passing interactions at the same priority level, a random one will be chosen based on sub-action weights.

TunableList.name: aggregated_affordances
TunableList.description: A list of affordances composing this aggregate. A random one will be chosen from sub-action weights if multiple interactions pass at the same priority.

Tunable.name: priority
Tunable.description: The relative priority of this affordance compared to other affordances in this aggregate.
